thread.title: Drilling in Alaska Is Good for the Earth

author: Thomas Landstreet
title: Drilling in Alaska Is Good for the Earth
text:
It has been a good month for American energy development. The tax reform signed by President Trump contained a provision allowing for oil exploration in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. Last week the Interior Department proposed opening up wide swaths of territory offshore.
This is good policy for a lot of reasons, but the least obvious is that it will help the environment. Despite howls from the green lobby, the truth is that itâ€™s less hazardous to drill for oil on land and in shallow waters using conventional rigs.
